description: Young Junior appeared confident and charismatic even though this was his first porn shooting ever. He didn't need to audition to get the job. The pics he sent me on Facebook were proof enough that he was Maskurbate material. Hot smooth muscular jock type body, some tattoos, not too much, nice uncut cock and a gorgeous face. On top of that, Junior was a very nice guy off camera which made his first shooting a ball. Folks, meet never-seen-before Junior!
title: Junior, Scene #01
